00024 #ifndef SPOT_LTLAST_UNOP_HH

00027 #include <map>
00028 #include "refformula.hh"
00029 
00030 namespace spot
00031 {
00032   namespace ltl
00033   {
00034 
00037     class unop : public ref_formula
00038     {
00039     public:
00040       enum type { Not, X, F, G };
00041 
00044       static unop* instance(type op, formula* child);
00045 
00046       virtual void accept(visitor& v);
00047       virtual void accept(const_visitor& v) const;
00048 
00050       const formula* child() const;
00052       formula* child();
00053 
00055       type op() const;
00057       const char* op_name() const;
00058 
00060       static unsigned instance_count();
00061 
00062     protected:
00063       typedef std::pair<type, formula*> pair;
00064       typedef std::map<pair, formula*> map;
00065       static map instances;
00066 
00067       unop(type op, formula* child);
00068       virtual ~unop();
00069 
00070     private:
00071       type op_;
00072       formula* child_;
00073     };
